price: 8. Nous avons mis à leurs cous des chaînes qui leur arrivent jusqu’aux mentons et forcent leurs têtes à se dresser (vers le ciel).
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ أَغۡلَٰلٗا فَهِيَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَذۡقَانِ فَهُم مُّقۡمَحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnā fī aʿnāqihim aghlālan fahiya ilā al-adhqāni fahum muq'maḥūna
